Title: Tatakae! Chou Robot Seimeitai Transformers Victory Soushuuhen
Description: ['Six recap episodes of ', Tatakae! Chou Robot Seimeitai Transformers Victory, ' released straight to home-video after the main anime finished airing on national Japanese TV. Sometimes they are are labeled as episode 39-44. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', " The first of these recaps was not included on Pioneer's DVD re-release in 2003 but the others are. The final ep of these recaps also uses footage from ", Transformers Headmasters, ' and ', Transformers: Choujin Master Force, ' into the narrative, most of which are repurposed as new events occurring concurrently with the story line.
